text: kl alatemt altyibt kanat halalana li'abna' yaequb ealayh alslam 'iilaa ma hrram yaequb ealaa nafsih lmrd nazal bh, wdhlk min qabl 'an tunazzal altwra. falamaa nuzzilt altawrat hrram allah ealaa bani 'iisrayiyl bed alatemt alty kanat halalana lhm; wdhlk lzlmhm wbghyhm. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: hatuu altwrat, waqrwu ma fiha 'iin kuntum mhqyn fi dewakm 'ana allah 'anzal fiha tahrim ma hrramh yaequb ealaa nfsh, hataa taelamuu sidq ma ja' fi alquran min 'ana allah lm yhrm ealaa bani 'iisrayiyl shyyana min qibal nuzul altwrat, 'iilaa ma hrramh yaequb ealaa nfsh
